header.description: A powerful, free, and open-source software that can record content from mainstream live streams with one click. It supports real-time monitoring of live rooms and detects resolution changes, automatically re-recording to ensure consistently excellent recording quality. Perfectly compatible with Mac and Windows systems, providing you with a convenient recording experience.
header.please_enter_stream_url: Please enter the live stream URL

features.title: Open Source and Free, Enjoy Worry-Free

easy_to_use.title: Simple and Convenient, One-Click Recording
easy_to_use.desc: Extremely simple and convenient to operate, recording with just one click. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced user, you can quickly get started and easily capture every exciting moment in the live stream.

monitor_stream.title: Real-time Monitoring, Automatic Recording
monitor_stream.desc: Supports real-time monitoring of live rooms and detects resolution changes, automatically re-recording instantly to ensure consistently excellent recording quality.

resolution_change.title: Precise Detection, Clear Picture
resolution_change.desc: Able to detect resolution changes, completely solving screen tearing issues. Presents you with clear and smooth recorded footage, as if you were there, bringing an ultimate visual experience.

question1.title: Which version should I download?
question1.content: Apple M series chip users, please download the arm64.dmg version. Other users, please download the x64.dmg version. Windows users, please download the .exe version.

question2.title: How to record live rooms and what does each configuration mean?
question2.content: Click 'Start Recording', enter the live room address, click 'Start Preview', and you can begin recording.

question4.title: What if Windows reports a virus?
question4.content: You can simply ignore it. Fideo is open-source and free, and will not cause any harm to your system.

question5.title: What if the browser blocks the download?
question5.content: Try switching to a different browser to download

question7.title: How to get the XiZhi Key?

question8.title: Why am I not receiving push notifications after filling in the XiZhi Key?
question8.content: WeChat push notifications are only sent when the software is minimized. If the software is not minimized, no notifications will be sent.
